meanings.definition: The process of making an area more urban.
meanings.sent1: The urbanisation of the small town brought in more buildings and roads.
meanings.sent2: Urbanisation has led to more people living in cities rather than rural areas.
meanings.sent3: The urbanisation of the countryside turned fields into bustling streets.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas sparked an urbanisation of creativity in the community.
meanings.sent5: The rapid urbanisation of the once quiet village changed its landscape completely.

meanings.definition: The growth of cities and towns.
meanings.sent1: The urbanisation of the region attracted businesses and residents.
meanings.sent2: Urbanisation is a result of more people moving to urban areas for work.
meanings.sent3: The urbanisation of the neighborhood made it easier to access amenities.
meanings.sent4: The urbanisation of the town symbolized progress and development.
meanings.sent5: The urbanisation of the city skyline was a sight to behold.
